name: Saphire Blue Drone
about: Saphire Blue Drone flying school, located in Nelspruit, Mpumalanga, South Africa, is a Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) accredited training organization. We specialize in providing comprehensive drone training, ensuring students meet all the theoretical and practical requirements to become certified commercial drone pilots. Our courses are designed to comply with the South African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA) standards, and we have trained numerous reputable companies such as Andrew Aveley Photography, Africa Photographic services, and several game reserves. Our expert instructors guide students through the entire process, from basic drone operation to advanced commercial flying. Enroll with Saphire Blue to start your journey to becoming a professional drone pilot today.
